content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy We offer drop-in and bookable study spaces across our libraries to support your studies. There are a wide range of study spaces available in our libraries. We can help you to find the right space for you. Drop-in study spaces are available in all libraries, including group study space. But if you have a favourite spot or just want to be sure of a space, then you can book in advance online using Click and Study. We are providing additional study space around campus to support students taking exams this autumn. How to book space using Click and Study How to check-in to your pre-booked space Locations and opening times Group? Silent? With a PC? Find out more about the types of spaces available. Computer rooms are available across all campuses, with many open 24/7. Dedicated study space and assistive technology rooms King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
